main.name: Meenakshi Lodhi
main.description: I can sum up my entire personal and professional life in three words - I CAN WIN
main.bio: Hello, I am Meenakshi, a B.Sc Computer Science graduate from CCS University Meerut in 2019. I Achieved success in both academics and sports & earned numerous gold medals in various competitions. I have experience in teaching and running a coaching center, and have taught over 200+ students in the last 2 years. I am currently a Youtuber, freelancer, Teaching Assistant, and Trainee at functionUp Bootcamp for backend development using Node JS, Express JS, MongoDB, and also AWS S3, Redis, HTML & CSS. I have completed various projects such as e-commerce website, book management system, blogging site, URL shortener, and college internship portal using these technologies.My goal is to work with a reputed company for a successful career in the tech field. I am confident that my skills and project experience make me a strong fit for this role. I am a self-motivated, hard-working, and disciplined individual with strong communication and problem-solving skills.My greatest strength is my creativity, I am confident that I can make a valuable contribution to your company and believe that my skills and project experience make me a strong fit for this role in backend development. Thank you for considering me for this opportunity. I look forward to your response.

education.college: D.N. College Meerut affliated to CCS University
education.description: Graduated with First Class Honours with higest percentage in college

work.title: Nodejs, MongoDB, Express, JsonWebToken
work.description: We have successfully completed our project, Blogging Site, with my teammates  Ishaan Mangal, Atul Yadav and Subhajeet Banerjee.This is a group project where we had to create API's for resgistering a user as a Author login of user with JWT Token for authentication purpose and has has worked on authorization for creating blogs, getting list of blogs, updation and deletion of the blogs.

work.title: Nodejs, MongoDB, Express, Javascript
work.description: OPEN TO INTERN PROJECT, with my teammates Prital Rupnur, Jyoti Kumari and Bhuwan Singh Samant. In this project we basically managed the students who want to apply for the interns in a particular college. There we introduced 3 #apis and have done the authentication, validations using different functions which was executed by mongodb and nodejs .

work.title: Nodejs, MongoDB, Express, Javascript, Redis

work.description: We have successfully completed our 5th Project, Shopping Cart, with my teammates Rupali Kumari, Shivanshi Panday & Mohd Abass Hasan. In this project we basically have added 4 features namely User, Product , Cart and Order.
